analysis.description:
FiftyFlip.sendFunds (/data/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#323-331) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- success = paidUser.send(amount) (/data/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#324)

Reentrancy in FiftyFlip.wager (/data/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#128-159):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(donate_amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#150)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bets (/data/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#153)
	- bets (/data/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#154)
	- bets (/data/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#155)
	- bets (/data/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#156)
